scripts.build-dig-dev: nodemon --watch ./digital/src -e js --exec 'cross-env MODE=development DIR_APP=digital webpack --config webpack.config.js'
scripts.build-tan-dev: nodemon --watch ./tangible/src -e js --exec 'cross-env MODE=development DIR_APP=tangible webpack --config webpack.config.js'
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-tan-dev & npm run build-dig-dev
scripts.build: npm run build-tan && npm run build-dig
